prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Organ, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features the sounds of Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Organ, and Piano, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Organ, and Piano, but Bass is absent.

Style 3:
Guitar, Synth Pad, Drums, Organ, and Piano are all present in this song, but Bass is not included.
